SEARCH
Package control

Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
control.EnquiryManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends Object implements IEnquiryManager
The EnquiryManager class handles user enquiries about BTO projects.

This singleton class implements the IEnquiryManager interface and provides:

  • Enquiry creation and management
  • Retrieval of enquiries by project or user
  • Enquiry updates and replies
  • Enquiry data persistence

EnquiryManager acts as a communication channel between applicants and HDB managers, allowing users to ask questions about BTO projects and receive official responses.

Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static EnquiryManager getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance of EnquiryManager.

      Creates the instance if it doesn't already exist.

      Returns:
      The singleton EnquiryManager instance

    • loadEnquiries

      private void loadEnquiries()
      Loads enquiry data from the enquiries.txt file.

      Creates Enquiry objects with all their associated data:

      • Unique identifier
      • Creator (user who submitted the enquiry)
      • Target project
      • Enquiry content
      • Reply (if any)

    • saveEnquiries

      public void saveEnquiries()
      Saves all enquiry data to the enquiries.txt file.

      Writes each enquiry's data as a pipe-separated line with all relevant details: enquiry ID, creator NRIC, project name, content, and reply (if any).

      Specified by:
      saveEnquiries in interface IEnquiryManager

    • getEnquiriesForProject

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • createEnquiry

      public Enquiry createEnquiry(User creator, BTOProject project, String content)
      Creates a new enquiry about a BTO project.

      Generates a unique ID for the enquiry, adds it to the system, and associates it with the project.

      Specified by:
      createEnquiry in interface IEnquiryManager
      Parameters:
      creator - The user creating the enquiry
      project - The BTO project the enquiry is about
      content - The content/question of the enquiry
      Returns:
      The newly created enquiry

    • updateEnquiry

      public boolean updateEnquiry(String id, String content, User user)
      Updates the content of an existing enquiry.

      Only the creator of an enquiry can update it, and only if it has not yet been replied to.

      Specified by:
      updateEnquiry in interface IEnquiryManager
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the enquiry to update
      content - The new content for the enquiry
      user - The user attempting to update the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • deleteEnquiry

      public boolean deleteEnquiry(String id, User user)
      Deletes an enquiry from the system.

      Only the creator of an enquiry can delete it, and only if it has not yet been replied to.

      Specified by:
      deleteEnquiry in interface IEnquiryManager
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the enquiry to delete
      user - The user attempting to delete the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • addReply

      public boolean addReply(String id, String reply, User user)
      Adds a reply to an enquiry.

      Only HDB Officers and Managers can reply to enquiries, and an enquiry can only be replied to once.

      Specified by:
      addReply in interface IEnquiryManager
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the enquiry to reply to
      reply - The reply content
      user - The user adding the reply
      Returns:
      true if the reply was successfully added, false otherwise

    • formatDateTimeForReport

      public String formatDateTimeForReport(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Formats a datetime for display in reports.

      Converts a LocalDateTime to a user-friendly string format.

      Parameters:
      dateTime - The datetime to format
      Returns:
      A formatted string representation of the datetime, or "N/A" if null

    • replyToEnquiry

      public boolean replyToEnquiry(String enquiryId, String reply, HDBManager manager)
      Allows an HDB Manager to reply to an enquiry about their managed project.

      A manager can only reply to enquiries for projects they manage.

      Specified by:
      replyToEnquiry in interface IEnquiryManager
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The unique identifier of the enquiry to reply to
      reply - The reply content
      manager - The HDB Manager adding the reply
      Returns:
      true if the reply was successfully added, false otherwise
